posts.title: Learning JavaScript
posts.body: In order to become a web developer, I should be proficient in this language so I can build websites from scratch

posts.title: Visit Paris
posts.body: I would love to visit the Eiffel Tower and the countless other gorgeous landmarks and monuments that add to the beauty of the spacious boulevards and charming caf√©s from Paris

posts.title: Making new friends
posts.body: I would like to know new people that can enrich my personal life. I would love to discover their ways, beliefs, traditions and have a great time with them.

posts.title: Playing soccer again
posts.body: I loved playing soccer when I was young and would like to play again
